sql.isNotEmpty: u.TECH_ORDER_ID in (select a.TECH_ORDER_ID from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NO) like upper('%'||#PRD_NO#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.TECH_ORDER_ID in (select a.TECH_ORDER_ID from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NAME) like upper('%'||#PRD_NAME#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.TECH_ORDER_ID in (select a.TECH_ORDER_ID from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_SPEC) like upper('%'||#PRD_SPEC#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)

sqlMap.sql: select u.TECH_ORDER_ID, u.TECH_ORDER_NO, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.ORDER_CHANN_ID, u.ORDER_CHANN_NO, u.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.ORDER_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') ORDER_DATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, (case u.STATE when '提交' then 1 when '待核价' then 2 when '已核价' then 3 else 4 end) paixu from ERP_TECH_ORDER u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM ERP_TECH_ORDER u

select u.TECH_ORDER_ID, u.TECH_ORDER_NO, u.FROM_BILL_ID, u.FROM_BILL_NO, u.ORDER_CHANN_ID, u.ORDER_CHANN_NO, u.ORDER_CHANN_NAME, to_char(u.ORDER_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') ORDER_DATE, u.REMARK, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_TECH_ORDER u where u.TECH_ORDER_ID = #TECH_ORDER_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.TECH_ORDER_DTL_ID, u.TECH_ORDER_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, a.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, u.PRICE, u.DECT_RATE, u.DECT_PRICE, u.ORDER_NUM, u.REMARK, u.IS_CAN_PRD_FLAG, u.PRICE_DECIDE, u.NEW_PRD_ID, u.NEW_PRD_NO, u.NEW_PRD_NAME, u.NEW_PRD_SPEC, u.DEL_FLAG, u.SPCL_TECH_ID, att.ATT_ID, att.ATT_PATH from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH a on a.SPCL_TECH_ID = u.SPCL_TECH_ID and a.USE_FLAG=1 left join BASE_ATT att on att.FROM_BILL_ID = u.TECH_ORDER_DTL_ID
sqlMap.select: select FROM_BILL_DTL_ID from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL where TECH_ORDER_ID=#TECH_ORDER_ID# and DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# and IS_CAN_PRD_FLAG=#IS_CAN_PRD_FLAG#
select count(TECH_ORDER_DTL_ID) from ERP_TECH_ORDER_DTL where TECH_ORDER_ID=#TECH_ORDER_ID# and DEL_FLAG=#DEL_FLAG# and IS_CAN_PRD_FLAG=#IS_CAN_PRD_FLAG#
